title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A friends words may sting with the truth, and its likely for your own good. Sometimes, people say they want others to mind their own business, but rarely is it the job of a true soul companion to keep completely silent. Being someones bestie doesnt mean approving of everything they say or do. It means telling the truth as you see it. Theres no reason to be defensive if you receive discouraging feedback when all you wanted was support. The well-meaning wisdom might be hard to swallow at first, but its part of making you a better person. Poet William Blake wrote, Opposition is true friendship. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
